introduction: Documentary about the late Tony Benn. Known for being the longest serving Labour MP in history, Tony Benn earned the British public's trust as he vowed to bring power to the masses. In the months before his death in March 2014, Tony Benn sat down with director Skip Kite and recounted some of the most memorable moments of his life and career. Featuring archive footage, photographs and intimate interviews with friends, family, colleagues and Benn himself, the documentary explores the life of the real man behind the political mask.
